title: Certain orders thought meet to be put in execution against the infection of the plague.
author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.
publisher: by Robert Barker printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,
notes: Dated at end: Die Iovis 9. Septemb. 1641.
With engraving of royal seal of Charles I at head of document.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
